meanings.definition: The act or instance of intending
meanings.sent1: Her intensions were clear from the determined look on her face.
meanings.sent2: His intensions to help others always shone through in his actions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's intensions to catch the mouse were foiled by its quick escape.
meanings.sent4: The intensions of the storm could be felt in the heavy clouds looming overhead.
meanings.sent5: The intensions of the chef to create a masterpiece were evident in every dish.

meanings.sent1: The intensions of the message were misunderstood by the recipient.
meanings.sent2: The intensions behind the decision were finally revealed during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The intensions of the gift were lost in translation, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent4: The intensions of the law were clear, but its implementation faced challenges.
meanings.sent5: The intensions of the artist were reflected in every stroke of the painting.

meanings.sent1: Her intensions for the project were to create a positive impact.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to achieve their shared intensions.
meanings.sent3: His intensions to win the game were evident in his focused expression.
meanings.sent4: The intensions of the marathon runner were set on reaching the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The intensions of the student to excel in academics were unwavering.

meanings.sent1: The intensions of the poem were open to various interpretations.
meanings.sent2: Each person had their own intensions of the mysterious symbol.
meanings.sent3: The intensions of the dream left her pondering its significance.
meanings.sent4: The intensions of the ancient text were decoded by the archaeologist.
meanings.sent5: The intensions of the song lyrics resonated differently with each listener.

meanings.sent1: His intensions towards his work were always positive and enthusiastic.
meanings.sent2: She approached challenges with a determined intensions to overcome them.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful intensions brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The intensions of the team leader influenced the morale of the group.
meanings.sent5: The intensions of the teacher to inspire her students were evident in her lessons.
